name: Les Savy Fav
description: '''Les Savy Fav''' ({{IPAc-en|l|eɪ|_|ˈ|s|ɑː|v|i|_|ˈ|f|ɑː|v}} {{respell|lay|_|SAH|vee|_|FAHV}}) is an American [[indie rock]] band based in New York City. Their style is influenced by [[art punk]] and [[post-hardcore]]. The group is known for the stage presence of lead singer [[Tim Harrington (singer)|Tim Harrington]]. The band is signed to [[Frenchkiss Records]], which is owned by the band's bassist, [[Syd Butler]].
